front.title: I2NSF Security Controller-Facing Interface YANG Data Model for Cross-Domain IPsec Flow Protection

author.organization: Department of Computer Science and Engineering
Department of Computer Science and Engineering
Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering

abstract.t: This document defines an information model and a YANG data model for the Security Controller-Facing Interface between two security controllers in an Interface to Network Security Functions (I2NSF) framework. This interface is used for the exchange of IPsec flow protection information between two Network Security Functions (NSFs) in cross-domain environments. The YANG data model in this document is built on the basis of the YANG data model for IPsec flow protection based on Software-Defined Networking (SDN).
